name: ShowHideFieldsBehaviors
shortdesc: A collection of show/hide fields behavior objects.

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the ShowHideFieldsBehavior.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ShowHideFieldsBehavior

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehaviors within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The ShowHideFieldsBehavior, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ShowHideFieldsBehavior, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The ShowHideFieldsBehavior, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ShowHideFieldsBehavior, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the ShowHideFieldsBehavior that follows the desired ShowHideFieldsBehavior.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior whose index follows the specified ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The ShowHideFieldsBehavior whose index comes before the desired ShowHideFieldsBehavior.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ShowHideFieldsBehavior.
Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
